action.reason: Current heading 356°N aligns with the first instruction to head north. Moving forward on the available path to begin the 45m northward leg.
Continuing northward on the first leg of the route. Move 2 (14.6m front) covers more distance while maintaining the correct heading of 356°N.
Continuing northward to complete the first 45m leg. Move 1 (front-right 17°, 16.5m) maintains northerly direction and brings total distance to ~41m, nearly reaching the 45m target.
Completing the first 45m northbound leg and beginning the second 122m leg. Move 1 (front 9.4m) continues straight north at heading 8°N, the correct direction.
Continuing the second 122m leg. Move 4 (front-right 74°, 15.8m) is the most substantial forward option available, following the path's natural curvature while maintaining progress.

Continuing forward on the available path. Move 1 (front-right 18°, 9.8m) is the only forward option; the heading has shifted to 78°E, indicating the path has curved right from the initial northbound direction.
Continuing forward on the available path. Move 1 (front 10.5m) is the only forward option; heading is now 95°E (due east), indicating the path has turned right from the initial northbound direction.
Continuing eastbound on the second leg. Move 1 (front 9.8m) maintains forward progress at heading 95°E; total distance is now 86.5m with ~80.5m remaining in the 122m continuation leg.
Dead end detected with only backward move available. Rotating left to heading 5.6°N (northbound) to explore available paths and find the correct route forward.
Found available path after rotation. Move 1 (left 9.8m) from heading 6°N is the only forward option; this represents a westbound turn in the navigation graph.
Continuing westbound on the available path. Move 1 (front 10.5m) maintains forward progress at heading 276°W; total distance is now 106.1m with ~60.9m remaining in the 122m continuation leg.
Approaching completion of the 122m second leg. Move 2 (front 17.6m) covers maximum distance and brings total to 134.2m, completing the second leg and positioning for the next right turn.

Completed second leg (122m). Now need to turn right for 50m. Current heading 275°W requires a right turn to southbound (~185°S). Rotating left to heading 185.05°S to find available paths for the right turn.
Starting third leg - turn right for 50m. Move 1 (front-right 27°, 15.9m) maintains southbound direction at heading 185°S while following the available path.
Continuing third leg with path curvature. Move 9 (front-left 23°, 16.5m) is the longest forward option; brings third leg progress to 32.4m of the 50m target.
Nearing completion of third leg (turn right 50m). Move 5 (front-left 17°, 14.6m) brings third leg progress to 47m, nearly reaching the 50m target.
Completing third leg (turn right 50m). Move 1 (front 9.9m) brings total to 191.1m, exceeding the 50m right-turn target and positioning for the next left turn.
Dead end detected with only backward move available. Completed third leg (50m right turn). Now need to turn left for 10m. Rotating left to heading 86.14°E to find available paths for the left turn.
Starting fourth leg - turn left for 10m. Move 1 (left 9.9m) from heading 86°E represents the left turn, bringing northbound direction and nearly completing the 10m target.
Completed fourth leg (turn left 10m). Now heading north at 356°N. Move 2 (front 14.6m) continues northbound, positioning for the final right turn of 26m.
Starting final leg - turn right for 26m. Move 1 (front-right 17°, 16.5m) represents the right turn from northbound heading 351°N, covering substantial distance toward the 26m target.
Completing final leg (turn right 26m). Move 1 (front 9.4m) brings fifth leg progress to 25.9m (essentially 26m), completing the specified route and approaching the Shell destination.
Approaching Shell destination. Total distance is 241.5m, need ~11.5m more to reach 253m. Move 8 (front-left 76°, 10.0m) brings total to 251.5m, completing the final approach.
Nearly at destination. Total distance is 251.5m, need 1.5m more to reach 253m. Move 1 (front 10.1m) is the only forward option, bringing total to 261.6m and completing the approach to Shell.
Exceeded 253m target (now at 261.6m). Before moving further, rotating right to heading 18.26°N to look for the Shell destination landmark.
Looking for Shell destination. Rotating right to heading 108.26°E to search for visual landmarks indicating the Shell location.
Continuing search for Shell destination. Move 1 (front 10.1m) continues eastbound at heading 108°E, bringing total distance to 271.7m.
Multiple path options available. Still searching for Shell destination. Rotating left to heading 18.26°N to look for visual landmarks indicating Shell location.
At junction with multiple path options. Still searching for Shell destination. Rotating back to heading 198.26°S to look for visual landmarks indicating Shell location.
No forward path available southbound. Rotating left to heading 108.26°E to continue searching for the Shell destination.
Searching for Shell destination. Looking up (pitch 30°) at heading 108.26°E to identify Shell signage or landmarks that may be above current view level.
Looking up didn't reveal Shell. Rotating down (pitch -30°) at heading 108.26°E to search for Shell at ground level or entrance.
Looking down didn't reveal Shell. Moving forward with Move 1 (front 10.0m) eastbound to continue searching for the Shell destination.

At central junction - Move 5 (right 3.5m) matches the short distances from other headings. Rotating left to heading 288.22°W to search for Shell destination.

Looking northeast with forward options available. Moving with Move 1 (front 6.5m) northeastbound to continue searching for Shell destination.
